Class Player

extends Sprite
    Representing the Player of the game Contains both the game mechanics related to the player and sprite data

      • Player

        public Player(int yTile,
              int xTile,
              int numSprites,
              int currentSprite,
              java.lang.String name,
              GameModel game)
        Constructs the Player object within the GameModel
        Parameters:
        yTile - Starting Y coordinate
        xTile - Starting X coordinate
        numSprites - Number of different animation sprites associated with Player
        currentSprite - Initial sprite Player loads as
        name - Name of PLayer
        game - GameModel object player will exist in
        See Also:
        GameModel
